translations: 表示对某人的轻视、不敬、小看

sentences.sentence: By running constant deficits, it is dis-saving, even as households save more.
sentences.translation: 通过持续的赤字，即使家庭储蓄更多也是在负储蓄。

sentences.sentence: Ole missis, she tole me I got to go an' git dis water an' not stop foolin' roun' wid anybody.
sentences.translation: 老太太，她告诉我去提水，路上不准停下来和别人玩。
哎，我是在说你的衣服，你怎么又扯上我的头发。
